select c.category courseCategory,sum(g.final_grade * c.credit)/sum(c.credit) avgScore from course c left join grade g on c.course_id = g.course_id
and g.student_id like concat(#{grade},'%')
and c.semester in
#{semester}
group by c.category order by case when c.category = '数学' then 1 when c.category = '计算机' then 2 when c.category = '电子信息' then 3 when c.category = '自然基础学科' then 4 when c.category = '思想道德' then 5 when c.category = '体育' then 6 end
